:DCS6

:
GridOff:AxesOff:0->Xmin:94->Xmax  //prepare graph screen
~62->Ymin:0->Ymax
FnOff
""->Str1   //masks
""->Str2  //sprites
Lbl 1
randInt(0,3)->A   //random sprite
For(Y,~35,15,10   //falling loop
	RecallPic 2    //redraw background
	sub(Str2,A*256+1,256   //select sprite to display
	identity(5,Ans,32,Y,4,32,3,0,1   //display sprite
	identity(5,Ans,32,Y,4,32,3,0,1		//this clears the sprite
End
sub(Str1,A*256+1,256    //select mask
identity(5,Ans,32,Y-10,4,32,1,0,1   //display mask
sub(Str2,A*256+1,256    //select sprite
identity(5,Ans,32,Y-10,4,32,3,0,1   //display sprite
Pause
identity(5,Ans,32,Y-10,4,32,3,0,1   //clear sprite
RecallPic 2		//this makes it smoother
Goto 1    //loop around (will be removed later)
